A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: what a waste of potential. Lets just focus on Luke who is a total waste here\, after more than 30 years waiting for him to return and to see him milk a space sea cow on screen just crushes you. I know Rey is our new Hero but Snoke (another wasted character) and him had to give us the greatest single Jedi / Sith confrontation ever seen in the saga. if he had to die sure but give him an Epic death not a Jedi mind trick.
